SELECT G_NAME, PRODUCTNO FROM mini_db2.T1_RETURN R LEFT JOIN mini_db2.T1_GUEST G ON G.USERID = R.USERID AND G.G_PHONE = R.G_PHONE
WHERE R.USERID = #{userId} AND PRODUCTNO = #{productNo}

SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM mini_db2.T1_RETURN R LEFT JOIN mini_db2.T1_GUEST G ON G.USERID = R.USERID AND G.G_PHONE = R.G_PHONE LEFT JOIN mini_db2.T1_PRODUCT P ON P.PRODUCTNO = R.PRODUCTNO INNER JOIN mini_db2.T1_PDIMAGE PI ON R.PRODUCTNO = PI.PRODUCTNO INNER JOIN (SELECT COUNT(*) AS RETCNT, R.PRODUCTNO, R.USERID FROM mini_db2.T1_RETURN R GROUP BY R.PRODUCTNO) RC ON RC.PRODUCTNO = R.PRODUCTNO
WHERE G.USERID = #{userId} AND IMGSRC NOT LIKE '%BackGround%' AND MAINYN = 'Y'
AND P.P_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
